code: import{useEffect,useContext}from'react';import{getToken}from'../services/provider/autentication';import{setState}from'../store/actions';import DashboardContext from'../contexts/generalContext';export default function useInit(){const[,dispatch]=useContext(DashboardContext);const getData=async()=>{const token=await getToken();dispatch(setState({token:token.access_token}));};useEffect(()=>{getData();const intervalId=setInterval(()=>{getData();},3580000);return()=>{clearInterval(intervalId);};},[]);}
